summary.span: 提供方法來建立自訂規則，以檢查使用者輸入的有效性。

span.span: Provides a way to create a custom rule in order to check the validity of user input.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]您可以建立關聯的資料繫結模型，與繫結物件。When you use the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding model, you can associate with your binding object. 若要建立自訂規則，讓子類別的類別並實作方法。To create custom rules, make a subclass of this class and implement the method. （選擇性） 使用內建，它會攔截來源更新期間所擲回的例外狀況或，所引發之錯誤的檢查來源物件的實作。Optionally, use the built-in , which catches exceptions that are thrown during source updates, or the , which checks for errors raised by the implementation of the source object. 繫結引擎會檢查每個每次傳送的輸入的值，也就是繫結的目標屬性值，以繫結來源屬性，這是繫結相關聯。The binding engine checks each that is associated with a binding every time it transfers an input value, which is the binding target property value, to the binding source property. 關於資料驗證的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For detailed information about data validation, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). 如需如何驗證使用者提供的資料，在對話方塊中的資訊，請參閱[對話方塊概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/dialog-boxes-overview.md)。For information about how to validate user-provided data in a dialog box, see [Dialog Boxes Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/dialog-boxes-overview.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何實作某個驗證規則。The following example shows how to implement a validation rule. 輸入的值無效，如果它包含非數字字元，或超出下限與上限。The input value is invalid if it contains non-numeric characters or if it is outside the lower and upper bounds. 如果傳回的值無效，屬性設定為適當的錯誤訊息和有屬性設定為`false`。If the value of the returned is invalid, the property is set to the appropriate error message and the property is set to `false`. 完整的範例，請參閱[如何： 實作繫結驗證](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md)。For the complete example, see [How to: Implement Binding Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立的子類別時，您必須實作這個方法若要建立自訂驗證規則的類別。You must implement this method when you create a subclass of the class in order to create a custom validation rule. 每次資料繫結引擎會傳送值從繫結目標屬性 （從使用者輸入） 為繫結來源屬性 （基礎資料），它會檢查是否有任何定義該繫結。Each time the data binding engine transfers a value from the binding target property (from user input) to the binding source property (the underlying data), it checks whether any are defined for that binding. 如果所定義的繫結引擎會呼叫方法，在每個直到其中一個找到錯誤，或直到它們全部都通過之後。If are defined for the binding, the engine calls the method on each until one of them finds an error or until all of them pass. 關於資料驗證的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For detailed information about data validation, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何實作某個驗證規則。The following example shows how to implement a validation rule. 在下列範例中，輸入的值不正確的如果它包含非數字字元，或者它是外部的下限和上限。In the following example, the input value is invalid if it contains non-numeric characters or if it is outside the lower and upper bounds. 如果輸入的值無效，屬性設定為適當的錯誤訊息和屬性設定為`false`。If the input value is invalid, the property is set to the appropriate error message and the property is set to `false`. 完整的範例，請參閱[如何： 實作繫結驗證](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md)。For the complete example, see [How to: Implement Binding Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md).
